Name: LU 564 - Zoning, La Hermosa, Manhattan (C 190434 ZMM)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 190434 ZMM, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 564).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - December 19, 2019

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sa240\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, La Hermosa Christian Church \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 6b, eliminating from within an existing R7-2 District a C1-4 District, eliminating from within an existing R8 District a C1-4 District, changing from an R7-2 District to a C1-9 District, and changing from an R8 District to a C1-9 District, which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the development of a mixed-use building at the northeast corner of Central Park, containing residential and community facility uses, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 10 (ULURP No. C 190434 ZMM) (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sa240\qj\tx720 WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on \fs22 October 15\fs24 , 2019, its decision dated \fs22 October 15\fs24 , 2019 (the \ldblquote Decision\rdblquote ) on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sa240\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications N 190433 ZRM (L.U. No. 565), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area; C 190435 ZSM (L.U. No. 566), a special permit pursuant to ZR Section 74-851 to modify certain height and setback regulations; and C 190436 ZSM (L.U. No. 567), a special permit pursuant to Zoning Resolution (ZR) Section 74-533 to waive accessory off-street parking requirements;\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sa240\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on November 4, 2019;\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sa240\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Revised Negative Declaration issued October 15\super th\nosupersub , 2019, which supersedes the Negative Declaration issued May 6\super th\nosupersub , 2019, and Revised Environmental Assessment Statement issued October 11\super th\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 19DCP116M) which included an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise on the development site (Block 1594, Lot 41) (the \ldblquote E\rdblquote  Designation (E-538)).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa240\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa240\qj\tx720\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-538) and Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sa240\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 190434 ZMM, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 6b: \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab eliminating from within an existing R7-2 District a C1-4 District bounded by West 111th Street, Fifth Avenue, a line midway between Central Park North and West 111th Street, and a line 100 feet westerly of Fifth Avenue; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li1080\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 2.\tab eliminating from within an existing R8 District a C1-4 District bounded by a line midway between Central Park North and West 111th Street, Fifth Avenue, Central Park North, and a line 100 feet westerly of Fifth Avenue (straight line portion) and its southerly prolongation; \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\fs20\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\fs24 3.\tab changing from an R7-2 District to a C1-9 District property bounded by West 111th Street, Fifth Avenue, a line midway between Central Park North and West 111th Street, and a line 200 feet westerly of Fifth Avenue; and \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\fs20\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\fs24 4.\tab changing from an R8 District to a C1-9 District property bounded by a line midway between Central Park North and West 111th Street, Fifth Avenue, Central Park North, and a line 200 feet westerly of Fifth Avenue (straight line portion) and its southerly prolongation; \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\fs20\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\fs24 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated May 6, 2019 and subject to the CEQR declaration of E-538, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 10.\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par

\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
